quest.name: Taking the Red
journal:
A distraught lass seeks a savior for her sister.

※This quest will unlock the red mage job.

An obviously distraught girl has begged you to help rescue her sister from a group of kidnappers. It seems a passing traveler has engaged the villains in combat, but the odds are not in his favor. Head out through the Gate of Thal, and find the well-dressed lass in central Thanalan.

You arrive at the scene of the battle, only to look on in amazement as a sword-wielding mage dispatches the last of the would-be kidnappers. Recover your composure, and approach the red-garbed traveler.

The traveler introduces himself as X'rhun Tia. Having eliminated the threat to the girl's safety, he proposes a return to her sister inside the city. Head back through the Gate of Thal, and speak with the distraught lass.

The sisters express their heartfelt thanks, and confirm that X'rhun truly is a Crimson Duelist like the heroes spoken of in their father's stories. After making sure that the girls are safely on their way home, the jovial red mage suggests you share a drink together. Make your way to the Coffer & Coffin, and look for X'rhun Tia.

X'rhun appears impressed by your strength of character, and offers to teach you the rudiments of red magic even as he taught them to Alisaie. He warns, however, that the path will be a demanding one. Consider his proposal, then speak with the red mage once more.

You convey to a delighted X'rhun your decision to become a red mage. He bestows upon you a Soul of the Red Mage, and bids you absorb its knowledge in preparation for the next step on your new path. Equip the mythrite rapier, and speak with X'rhun once more.
objectives: Speak with the well-dressed lass at Spineless Basin.
Speak with the distraught lass in Ul'dah.
Speak with X'rhun Tia at the Coffer & Coffin.

dialogue.name: MERCHANTSDAUGHTERONE
dialogue.text: Oh, oh, are you an adventurer!? Please, you have to rescue my sister!

dialogue.name: MERCHANTSDAUGHTERONE
dialogue.text: Some horrible people tried to kidnap us just outside the city gates! I managed to break free when a traveler stopped to help, but my sister never caught up to me.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I will save her!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Where are your parents?

dialogue.name: MERCHANTSDAUGHTERONE
dialogue.text: You will!? Oh, thank you! Thank you so much!

dialogue.name: MERCHANTSDAUGHTERONE
dialogue.text: Please, hurry through the gate here and just keep going straight ahead! You're sure to find them! The traveler was some sort of mage, I think, but it was one against five. Surely he couldn't stand against so many...

dialogue.name: MERCHANTSDAUGHTERONE
dialogue.text: Mama and Papa left early to deal with some merchants, and the Brass Blades don't seem to care what happens outside the city walls.

dialogue.name: MERCHANTSDAUGHTERONE
dialogue.text:
That traveler... He was some sort of mage, I think, but it was one against five. Surely he couldn't stand against so many.
What can I do? Won't you please help me...?

dialogue.name: MERCHANTSDAUGHTERONE
dialogue.text: Head towards the Spineless Basin crossroads! Honestly, we were barely a stone's throw from the Gate of Thal!

dialogue.name: MERCHANTSDAUGTERTWO
dialogue.text: Don't touch m─ Oh, you're not one of them!

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: (-Red-garbed Traveler-)...And who might you be?

dialogue.name: MERCHANTSDAUGTERTWO
dialogue.text: My little sister is safe? Oh, thank goodness!

dialogue.name: MERCHANTSDAUGHTERONE
dialogue.text: She's not hurt, then!? I'm so glad! Uh...did you not bring her with you?

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: You came to lend your aid? My apologies. Had I but known, I would have spared you a villain or two.

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: After all, you seem to share my distaste for those who would prey upon defenseless children. Aye! Birds of a feather are we!

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: (-X'rhun Tia-)I am X'rhun Tia, a pilgrim of sorts. Might I know your name, friend?

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text:
(-X'rhun Tia-)Forename...?
Hmmm, now why does that strike such a familiar chord?

dialogue.name: MERCHANTSDAUGHTERTWO
dialogue.text:
Excuse me, I...
I just wanted to thank you for saving me!

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: (-X'rhun Tia-)My pleasure, child. You are unharmed, yes?

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: (-X'rhun Tia-)Good. Let us escort this brave lass to her sister, then. Lead the way!

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: The sisters are reunited! You have done a good deed this day, friend.

dialogue.name: MERCHANTSDAUGHTERTWO
dialogue.text: Thank you again for coming to my rescue.

dialogue.name: MERCHANTSDAUGHTERONE
dialogue.text: You found her, adventurer! Thank you!

dialogue.name: MERCHANTSDAUGTERTWO
dialogue.text: We are very grateful for your kindness.

dialogue.name: MERCHANTSDAUGHTERONE
dialogue.text: ...I was so scared! What did those terrible people want with us!?

dialogue.name: MERCHANTSDAUGTERTWO
dialogue.text: You needn't worry about them anymore, Sister─the man in red defeated them all! You saw how he fought, with spells and steel? He's one of those heroes Papa told us about: a Crimson Duelist. ...Aren't you?

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: Hah, I did not expect to hear that name this far south into Eorzea.

dialogue.name: MERCHANTSDAUGTERTWO
dialogue.text: Then you are a Crimson Duelist! I knew it!

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: If your papa is telling his daughters tales of red mages, then he must be from Ala Mhigo, yes?

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: Well that would explain his choice of bedtime stories. Now, shall we see you lasses home?

dialogue.name: MERCHANTSDAUGTERTWO
dialogue.text: We'll be all right from here! Thank you again!

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: And away they skip, safe and happy. Now...Forename, was it not? I believe we've earned ourselves a celebratory drink!

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: Ahahaha! You need not feel compelled, my friend! Should the mood strike you, however, you'll find me staying over at Black Brush Station. I find the ale served at the Coffer & Coffin most agreeable.

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: Ah, you came! As it so happens, the mother of those girls tracked me down and insisted I accept a reward. Once I mentioned you might be stopping by, she left a token of gratitude for you as well.

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: It seems we've assisted an affluent merchant family─a revelation which might explain the attempted kidnapping. Hefty ransom, and all that. I'm told the girls were immediately assigned a capable bodyguard, however, so we can drink in peace knowing they are well protected!

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: Oh! I've remembered whence I know your name!

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: I mean, honestly, how could I forget one of the liberators of Ala Mhigo!? I blame the heat and an excess of fine ale. As a native of that troubled land, I must add mine own sincere gratitude to that of my countrymen.

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: Are you not one of the champions fighting to liberate Ala Mhigo? As a native of that troubled land, I must add mine own sincere gratitude to that of my countrymen.

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: At first I did not think you one and the same, but I have heard of the Forename whose deeds are celebrated across the four nations of Eorzea.

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: It was Alisaie who first mentioned you to me. After the tenth or so time some incident had her loudly wishing to have “Forename's courage” or “Forename's strength,” I became rather curious to meet you myself.

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: ...Ah, how do I know the indomitable Alisaie? Our paths crossed quite by chance─a fellow traveler met upon the road. She expressed an interest in red magery, and persuaded me to instruct her in the basics of the art.

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: It was Alisaie who first mentioned you to me. After she had alluded to more than a few of your more famous exploits, I became rather curious to meet you myself.

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: ...Ah, how do I know the indomitable Alisaie? Our paths crossed quite by chance─a fellow traveler met upon the road. She expressed an interest in red magery, and persuaded me to instruct her in the basics of the art.

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: I learned of you first from a young lass named Alisaie, whom I met upon the road. She expressed an admiration for your growing exploits, even as she persuaded me to teach her the basics of red magery.

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: She proved a quick study in the arcane side of things, but fencing was something of a challenge. By the end of our lessons, however, she had learned to combine spellcraft with swordplay: when to cast from afar, and when to lunge forward with a well-timed thrust!

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: ...And what of you, my friend? Have you any interest in the art? I suspect you would make an exceptional red mage!

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: I am deadly serious. A womanman who would rush to the aid of a stranger's child without fear or hesitation is a womanman I would trust with the power of red magic. But even beyond that...

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: I sense in you a kindred spirit.

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: Be warned, however, that my style of teaching is a practical one─I will expect you to join me on my journey, and assist me in aiding others. Accept those terms, and I will bestow upon you the accoutrements of a red mage.

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: Are you familiar with soul crystals? This particular stone is attuned to past wielders of red magicks, and will fill your mind with a firm foundation of technique. You need only reach forth your hand.

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: Are you prepared to walk the path of a red mage? One word, and the soul crystal is yours.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Will you become a red mage?

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text:
You will not regret this decision, my friend!
...Gods above! For a moment there, I thought you meant to refuse me!

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: A host of red mages committed their memories to this gem. And now it is yours.

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: Absorb the knowledge it contains, then we will discuss the finer points of red magic. Ah, but first, I should give you that reward!

dialogue.name: XRHUNTIA
dialogue.text: I understand that this is a road not lightly taken. Should you have a change of heart, however, know that you are always welcome to take up the red!
